## ValidatedData type

Returns a partial record where the keys are the same as the provided type guard and the values are type associated with the type guard.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ValidatedData<TypeGuards extends TypeGuardRecord> = Partial<{
    [Property in keyof TypeGuards]: InferTypeGuard<TypeGuards[Property]>;
}>;
```
<b>References:</b> [TypeGuardRecord](./answers-react-components.typeguardrecord.md)<!-- -->, [InferTypeGuard](./answers-react-components.infertypeguard.md)
